Package tictactoe

Class ImmutableGameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • tictactoe.ImmutableGameBoard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameBoard
    public class ImmutableGameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a read-only 2D game board.
    Author:
    Tapio Malmberg

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected byte[][] board
      The squares of the game board.

      Creates a new ImmutableGameBoard from an ImmutableGameBoard subclass without copying data.

                              int y)
        Checks if the given (x, y) coordinate is within the game board.
        Parameters:

        y - the y value of the coordinate
        Returns:
        true if the given coordinate is within the game board

      • getNumAdjacent

        public int getNumAdjacent​(Coordinate startPos,
                          Direction dir,
                          byte type,
                          boolean includeStartPos)
        Counts the number of adjacent pieces of the given type in the given direction, starting from the given coordinate.

        If includeStartPos is set to true, the starting position is included in the count.

        Parameters:
        startPos - the Coordinate of the starting position
        dir - the direction that will be moved to
        type - the type of square contents that must be matched
        includeStartPos - whether the starting position is included
        Returns:
        the number of adjacent pieces in the given direction
